import React,{lazy,Suspense}from'react';import{Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Box,CircularProgress,Typography}from'@mui/material';// Chargement paresseux des composants pour optimiser les performances
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ColsExplorer=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('../ColsExplorer'));const ColsComparisonPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('../ColsComparisonPage'));const ColDetail=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('../../components/cols/ColDetail'));const SevenMajorsChallenge=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('../../components/challenges/SevenMajorsChallenge'));// Composant de chargement
const LoadingComponent=()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',p:4,minHeight:'50vh'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{size:40}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",sx:{mt:2},children:"Chargement des donn\xE9es des cols..."})]});/**
 * Configuration des routes pour la section des cols
 */const ColsRoutes=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Suspense,{fallback:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingComponent,{}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ColsExplorer,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/compare",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ColsComparisonPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/detail/:colId",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ColDetail,{standalone:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/seven-majors/*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SevenMajorsChallenge,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/cols",replace:true})})]})});};export default ColsRoutes;
